alert.note: Alert for Northwest Deserts (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Watch issued December 24 at 4:17AM MST until December 24 at 5:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WATCH FOR THE FLAG BURN AREA REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding and debris flows caused by excessive rainfall continue to be possible. * WHERE...The Flag Fire Burn Scar located in the Hualapai Mountains and including the community of Pinion Pines. * WHEN...Through late this afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - National Weather Service Meteorologists have been tracking persistent moderate rainfall over the Flag Burn Scar area over the last several hours. Over 1.5 inches of rain has fallen near the burn scar area. An additional 1 to 1.5 inches is possible throughout the day Friday. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Monitor forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
